name: Trailhead Coffee Roasters
address:
118 NE Martin Luther King Jr Blvd
Portland, OR 97232

roasts.name: Provisions
roasts.tasting_notes: smooth, delicious, relaxing, spot-hitter. not really "exciting" but in a good way. excellent thermos coffee. chocolatey and gets more so as it cools, essential characteristic for thermos coffee. spot hitter! mulled wine aroma!

roasts.name: Provisions Black Label
roasts.tasting_notes: really good but prefer Provisions or All Day, and so many other blends to try. would not buy again but ONLY because Trailhead has so many other tempting choices to explore.

roasts.name: All Day
roasts.tasting_notes: does what it says on the tin. toasty, chocolatey, fruity, perfectly balanced. could definitely drink this all day!

roasts.name: Baylee Roaster's Reserve D.R. of Congo: Virunga National Park
roasts.tasting_notes: Earthy, raisiny, winey, full body, deliciously complex. Change the ratios to experience chocolate or red wine. Trailhead is one of my most exciting discoveries though the BVCP!
